authz.name: demo: check nova command
authz.description: Check demo can list nova servers due to the current rules

authz.name: demo: try to pause nova instance
authz.description: Pausing the server must be impossible due to the current rules

authz.name: check nova command
authz.description: Check that nova server is still in running state.

authz.name: list tenant
authz.description: Check if tenant demo is used.

authz.name: list_object
authz.description: Check that the new nova server was added.

authz.name: add_assignment
authz.description: Set the assignment 'low' to nova server

authz.name: check nova command
authz.description: Check that we can now list nova servers due to the current rules

authz.name: try to pause nova instance
authz.description: Pausing the server must be possible now

authz.name: check nova command
authz.description: Check that we can still list nova servers due to the current rules

authz.name: reactivate nova instance
authz.description: Unpausing the server for next tests

authz.name: del_assignment
authz.description: Delete the assignment 'low' to nova server

authz.name: add_assignment
authz.description: Set the assignment 'high' to nova server

authz.name: check nova command
authz.description: Check that we can now list nova servers due to the current rules

authz.name: try to pause nova instance
authz.description: Pausing the server must be not possible now

authz.name: check nova command
authz.description: Check that we can still list nova servers due to the current rules
